short_summary: Management advisory services and Business administration services
description: Health Canada has a requirement for Change Management Consultants and Facilitator Consultants to offer services across the organization on an as and when required basis.
full_summary:
### Task and Solutions Professional Services

**Title**: Task and Solutions Professional Services for Change Management Consultant and Facilitator Consultant, Level 2 (Intermediate)

**Reference Number**: cb-7754-83686928
**Amendment Number**: 1
**Solicitation Number**: 1000251654

**Notice Details**

* **Publication Date**: August 1, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 5, 2023, 2:00 P.M.
* **Contracting Entity**: Health Canada, Health Products and Food Branch
* **Area of Operation**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contact Information**: Rania Johnston, (343) 596-0320, rania.johnston@hc-sc.gc.ca

**Notice Description**

Health Canada is seeking the services of up to four (4) Level 2 Change Management Consultants and up to two (2) Level 2 Facilitator Consultants for the Health Products and Food Branch on an as-needed basis.

**Eligibility Requirements**

* The services are open to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who have qualified under Tier 1 for the following categories:
	+ Stream 2: Business Consulting/Change Management Stream
	+ Categories 2.6 Change Management Consultant, Level 2, and 2.15 Facilitator Consultant, Level 2.

**Procedures for Submission**

Proposals should be submitted by the due date to the contact person listed above. The winning bidders will be selected based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**.Document Attachments**

The complete notice is attached to this email. Please refer to the attached documents for more information. [link to attached documents] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7754/tsps_npp_1000251654_20230727_final_en.pdf) (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7754/tsps_npp_1000251654_20230727_final_fr.pdf) 

### Procedure for Obtaining Documents

To obtain a copy of the solicitation documents, please visit the Canada Buys website (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-canada/service-provider-directory).

### Important Dates

* **Tender Closing Date**: September 5, 2023
* **Contract Award Date**: TBA

### Trade
